Zhang Jiayuan

I am an undergraduate student at University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC) , majoring in Communication Engineering. However, my interests lies in Deep Learning. Previously, I was an intership student at Brain and Intelligence Lab, supervised by Prof. Gu Shi.

I will become a PhD student at Shanghai Jiaotong University (SJTU), supervised by Prof. Quanshi Zhang

Research interests

I have a broad interest in machine learning, particularly in Explainable AI. Previously, I have had experience in NeuroAI
